title: Who is Your Favorite Champion Designer?
body:
Everyone has their own preference, and opinion. Please do not ridicule or shame anyone for liking a designer. You may disagree with a person, that is fine.

My favorite designer would most likely be CertainlyT. Why? Most of his designs are game-changing, fun, and creative. I like the "I do not care for what others say." attitude. Zoe, Yasuo, Akali, Warwick and most of his creations are unique. I have not seen a champion like Zoe, Yasuo, or new Akali in other MOBA games other than League of Legends.
Sadly, I do not see much of the credit he deserves, but he still makes champions that fits a unique style. I like him, and I think he does his job well.

Keep up with the amazing work.

I do not mind if you all dislike CT, not all of his designs are for everyone.

Who is your favorite champion designer?
